title: Ohio GOP Senate showdown: Gibbons hits Mandel on China in ad that returns to root of combustible feud

sentence: Ohio GOP Senate candidate Josh Mandel dropped a particularly loathsome ad Tuesday where he’s filmed walking across the Edmund Pettus Bridge, the site of the famous Selma march for voting rights, which Mandel doesn’t support.

title: MLK Expert Josh Mandel Explains To MLK’s Daughter Bernice How Much MLK Loved Guns
